law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 402, sec. 5, effective January 1, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 31, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 139, effective June 21, 1974.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Nomination of candidates by state board of elections.
